name: Ball and Chain Parkour
description:
This is a minimalistic platforming game where the player is joined by a ball and chain. Try to reach each level's exit by picking the ball up and throwing it around!

This game is a submission for GMTK 2021.

Controls: 

Use WASD or Arrow Keys to move/jump.  

Hit space to pull toward and pick up the ball. Hit space again to throw the ball, using the keys to direct your throw.

Hit the R key to reset the level.

Tip: Most of the skill involved in the game is timing your jumps after throws and holding space to boost yourself.

Credits:

This game was developed by me, cosmomoney!

The music used in this game is "Interlude 4" by Quiet Music for Tiny Robots available under CC BY.
